goal.en: The primary goal of PH3009 is to prepare physics students for (1) more advanced physics courses and (2) basic trainings in their own research fields, e.g. AMO, condensed matter, high energy, etc.
goal.ch: The primary goal of PH3009 is to prepare physics students for (1) more advanced physics courses and (2) basic trainings in their own research fields, e.g. AMO, condensed matter, high energy, etc.

content.en: Emphasis of PH3009 will be more on the application side: How to do QM and how to apply QM to various physical systems. Historical development and philosophical implication of QM will only be briefly discussed, as these topics are not the main focus of PH3009.
